events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred on April 28, 2024, resulting in significant damage to the front bumper and hood of their vehicle.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident after identifying keywords such as collision and vehicle damage reported by the customer.
An agent specializing in auto claims was assigned to handle the customer's case and initiate further communication regarding next steps.
The claim has been formally acknowledged. Customer received confirmation that their report has been registered in the system.
Customer was requested to submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates to proceed with investigation.
Customer has submitted all requested documents including detailed images of the accident damage and official police report.
Investigation process has commenced focusing on accident verification, damage assessment, and liability determination.
The investigation confirmed the extent of damages and the accident circumstances, clearing the way for settlement discussions.
A settlement offer based on repair costs and policy limits was formulated and communicated to the customer for review.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement amount, expressing satisfaction with the prompt handling of the claim.
Based on investigation and customer agreement, the claim has been approved for payment under the terms of the policy.
Payment corresponding to the approved settlement was issued to the customer's account, completing financial obligations.
The claim was officially closed after payment, with confirmation sent to the customer thanking them for their cooperation.
All claim documents and correspondence have been archived for future reference in accordance with company policy.
